name: darkord-sls-auth
description: Auth microservice that provides authentication and authorization to enhance the security of any web server

scripts.deploy:stage:api: cross-env AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 sls deploy -c serverless.api.yml --stage stage --verbose --conceal
scripts.deploy:prod:api: cross-env AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 sls deploy -c serverless.api.yml --stage prod --verbose --conceal
scripts.deploy:stage:db: cross-env AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 sls deploy -c serverless.db.yml --stage stage --verbose --conceal
scripts.deploy:prod:db: cross-env AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 sls deploy -c serverless.db.yml --stage prod --verbose --conceal
scripts.deploy:stage:sf: cross-env AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 sls deploy -c serverless.sf.yml --stage stage --verbose --conceal
scripts.deploy:prod:sf: cross-env AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 sls deploy -c serverless.sf.yml --stage prod --verbose --conceal
scripts.deploy:stage: cross-env AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 sls deploy -c serverless.yml --stage stage --verbose --conceal
scripts.deploy:prod: cross-env AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 sls deploy -c serverless.yml --stage prod --verbose --conceal
